quote: What is better ? To be born good or to overcome your evil nature through great effort ?
author: Paarthurnax

quote: Stand in the ashes of a trillion dead souls, and asks the ghosts if honor matters. The silence is your answer.
author: Javik

quote: No gods or kings. Only man.
author: Andrew Ryan

quote: You are here, and it’s beautiful, and escaping isn’t always something bad.
author: Delilah

quote: We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret. But I think we can put our differences behind us. For science. You monster.
author: GLaDOS

quote: I used to be an adventurer like you, until I took an arrow to the knee.
author: Town Guard

quote: I'm rackin' my brain trying to think of a name for that diamond pony I bought. I was gonna call it 'piss-for-brains' in honor of you, but that just feels immature. Maybe... 'Butt Stallion'?
author: Handsome Jack

quote: No matter how dark the night, morning always comes, and our journey begins anew.
author: Lulu

quote: Tell me Bats. What are you really scared of? Failing to save this cesspool of a city? Not finding the Commissioner in time? Me, in a thong?
author: The Joker
